help-file.title: SHADOWMAGE
help-file.content:
The Master of the paths of magic and silent transference. A Shadowmage deeply studied will not feel the discomfort, unease and disorientation as other casters do upon using spells such as teleport, relocate and dimension door. They can also "Blink" out of the way causing foes hitting them bodily to fall as they fail their swing, possibly causing them to abort offensive magics against this Mage.
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 6th circle: Blink
